name: Vaultwarden
description: Helper integration for Vaultwarden (self-hosted Bitwarden alternative). This integration references the bitwarden integration for all functionality, as Vaultwarden uses a Bitwarden-compatible API.

note.title: Note
note.description: This is a helper integration. All functionality is provided by the bitwarden integration. Configure the bitwarden integration with your Vaultwarden API URL.
note.default: Vaultwarden uses a Bitwarden-compatible API. Configure the bitwarden integration with your Vaultwarden server URL in the api_url field.
